title: Platform to find quality writing jobs in one place
description:
I co-founded Best Writing, an online platform that simplifies the search for the best writing jobs worldwide. Initially the platform was build entirely using no-code tools. As the project evolved we designed and build a custom website using Next.js, Supabase and Tailwind CSS. The platform is currently in beta and we are looking for writers to join the platform.

More info coming soon.

title: Mobile app for convienient electic car charging
description:
Spirii was looking to expand the number of chargers and customers rapidly over the next 6-9 months. To support their growth we provided a more effective app out in the market and a new backend system.

The application for charging is one of the key components of Spirii vehicle charging service. The purpose of application is to provide a service without any additional support from the provider. However, with the previous app Spirii was receiving a lot of customer calls and emails requesting for help or even complaining about bad service.

Two focus areas emerged — a confusing sign up process and charging process which was not very well explained in the previous application.

results.intro: Our client expressed their satisfaction with the rapid pace of the design and development process, as it took us less than three months to redesign and create their new app. The improved digital service received a warm welcome from users who granted it an impressive 4.5-star rating on the App Store. Furthermore, the app's outstanding performance took it up to the #9 position in the Navigation category of Top Free Apps in Denmark.

title: Club app for F.C. Copenhagen football fans
description:
As the lead designer, I spearheaded the design of a mobile app aimed to boost fan engagement for the F.C. Copenhagen football club. My tasks involved collecting input from stakeholders, crafting experience flows, designing UI mockups, and steering the development of a React Native application.

The app offers live match updates, exclusive news, behind-the-scenes content, and digital stadium tickets. Additionally, I developed a scalable design system to guarantee that future mobile app development for football clubs is both streamlined and efficient.

results.intro: The F.C. Copenhagen mobile app was a resounding success, as reflected in the following key performance indicators.
list: Featured in the App Store: first weeks after the launch, the app was trending as a #1 in the Sports category.

Increased Fan Engagement: The app saw a significant rise in user engagement. This was attributed to the interactive features and exclusive content, which provided fans with a more immersive experience.

Higher Ticket Sales: The digital stadium ticketing feature contributed to an increase in online ticket sales over the first season of implementation. This not only made the ticket purchasing process more convenient for fans but also allowed the club to streamline its ticketing operations.

Enhanced Sponsor Visibility: The app provided new opportunities for sponsor promotion, leading to an increase in sponsorship revenue. The in-app advertisements and exclusive content deals were particularly attractive to sponsors, as they offered targeted visibility to a highly engaged audience
Scalable Design System: The development of a scalable design system ensured that future mobile app development for other football
